subject: Your Kanda subscription will renew soon

rows.text: I'm writing to inform you that your Kanda subscription renewal is coming up on ((renewal_date)). In the lead up, our team will give you a call to discuss if you'd like to renew and gather any feedback you might have.
In the meantime, if you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to our support team at sales@kanda.co.uk.
